meanings.definition: Try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She endeavoured to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always endeavoured to be kind to everyone he met.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel endeavoured to reach the acorn on the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The determined ant endeavoured to carry the heavy leaf back to its nest.
meanings.sent5: The young bird endeavoured to fly for the first time, flapping its wings eagerly.

meanings.definition: Make an effort to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: The team endeavoured to win the championship by practicing every day.
meanings.sent2: She endeavoured to save enough money to buy her dream car.
meanings.sent3: The chef endeavoured to create a new recipe using unusual ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The explorer endeavoured to reach the peak of the mountain despite the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The student endeavoured to improve his grades by studying diligently.
